issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. While AdGuard is active I can not unsubscribe from any video on YouTube on any browser. Disabling and trying the page again fails. If I disable AdGuard, close the browsers, then restart, the unsubscribe button is visible again. I did update filters. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/cq7zhgkoi08o4skkkgwcg8ggock0socbliaty4vxnk.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.2.168 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode options: | Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880),
Hide your Referrer from third-parties Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist,
NoCoin Filter List Other extensions used: | cookie auto delete

issue.title: opensource shopping cart system : OpenCart has been block by JapaneseFilter/sections/general_url.txt
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.2.168

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://ocam.live/index.php?route=product/product&product_id=6307

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Japanese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
this urle [index.php?route=product/product&product_id=$document,domain=cyou|life|live|shop|xyz] just match people use OpenCart system and  domain name end with cyou|life|live|shop|xyz.  I don't think it's a good rule. it kills so many web site. 

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>
![messageImage_1696557524042](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/6611523/adb158db-e868-41d3-9943-a8b1b8ae9f4f)
</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>




### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://stackoverflow.com/questions/56843592/does-anyone-have-references-on-how-to-port-aspectj-based-maven-module-to-bazel](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstackoverflow.com%2Fquestions%2F56843592%2Fdoes-anyone-have-references-on-how-to-port-aspectj-based-maven-module-to-bazel) ### Comment Username: @kriegaex > The "Share" links on Stack Overflow are not longer working, both on questions and on answers. The filter mistakes them for social media share widgets, which they are not. The links only display a pop-up with a URL to copy. > > This happened before on Stack Overflow with AdGuard. It was fixed quickly last time, but maybe it makes sense to explicitly white-list that website for this filter type or be more precise in matching. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/owlf4nfq0g04k0ow4so08o8o4o80gc0did3vog9vdw.png?nc=1)

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OpKkWMkiYgk](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DOpKkWMkiYgk) ### Comment > THIS STARTED JUST RECENTLY. OPENING ANY YOUTUBE VIDEO POP UP SHOWS OVER THE SCREEN AND EVERY THING STOPS. THE POPUP IS ASKING FOR DISABLING "ADD BLOCKER" I BLOCKED THAT POPUP. START THE VIDEO AND 5 SEC LATER STOPS I HAVE TO CLICK TO PLAY AGAIN. SAME TIME WHILE IS PLAYING THE SCROLL IS DISABLED. I CLICK ON NEXT VIDEO THAT I CAN SEE ION SCREEN IT WILL PLAY FOR ~5 SEC AND I HAVE TO RE START ### Screenshots
